details.description: Find your local Jobcentre Plus, make a new or repeat benefit claim over the phone, search for a job over the phone
details.body:
Find your local office, get help finding a job, report a change in your circumstances, change a Jobcentre Plus appointment or make a complaint.

Contact your Jobcentre Plus office or phone the Jobcentre Plus helplines listed below.

Benefits advice

Use benefits adviser to find out what benefits you may be entitled to.

Benefit claims

Telephone: 0800 055 6688
Textphone: 0800 023 4888
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm

You can also claim Jobseeker’s Allowance online.

Jobcentre Plus appointments

Cancel or change an appointment

Telephone: 0845 604 3719
Textphone: 0845 608 8551
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm

Find a job

Use the Jobcentre Plus job search to find a job. You can also use the Jobcentre Plus phone service.

Jobcentre Plus phone service

Telephone: 0845 6060 234
Textphone: 0845 6055 255
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm

You can apply for a National Insurance number or find out your number if you’ve lost it.

Make a complaint

To complain about Jobcentre Plus:

  1. Contact the person you’ve been dealing with (or their manager) - they’ll aim to resolve the problem within 15 days.

  2. If you’re not happy with the result, complain to the district manager - anyone at the centre you’ve been dealing with can tell you who this is.

  3. If you’re still not happy, contact the chief operating officer.

Chief Operating Officer
Department for Work and Pensions
6th Floor
Caxton House
Tothill Street
London SW1H 9NA

For more information, read the Jobcentre Plus service standards.

Download ‘About Jobcentre Plus: service standards’ (PDF, 1.6MB)

You can get independent advice from Citizens Advice.
